body.name: Ring Indoor Cam (2nd Gen) | latest generation, 2023 release | 1080p HD Video & Color Night Vision, Two-Way Talk, and Manual Audio & Video Privacy Cover | White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 48 mins
features: Get the whole picture – Watch over your home day or night in 1080p HD video with Live View and Color Night Vision.
Video previews – Record a few extra seconds before every motion event with Advanced Pre-Roll to get a more complete picture of what happened.
Privacy at your fingertips – Turn off your camera and mic with the manual Privacy Cover, then reactivate with a simple swivel.
Get important alerts – Get real-time alerts when the camera detects movement, and choose exactly what your camera covers so you only get notified above movement that matters.
Versatile mounting options – Find the perfect angle on a table, or mount up high with the flexible swivel mount. Indoor Cam is plug-in, making it easy to move where you need it.
Additional protection – With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review stored videos for up to 180 days (photos for 7 days), and share videos.
Connect with Alexa – Hear custom notifications from Echo Dot, launch video with Echo Show, and enjoy hands-free home monitoring with select Alexa-enabled devices.

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 1.93 in. x 1.93 in. x 3.81 in. (4.9 cm x 4.9 cm x 9.6 cm) including ball-joint plate and camera mount

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1080p HD, Live View, Color Night Vision

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: 6.5 ft Micro USB Power Adapter (10 ft Micro USB Power Cable sold separately)

productInformation.name: Internet Requirements
productInformation.value: Requires a minimum upload speed of 2 Mbps for optimal performance

productInformation.name: Box Includes
productInformation.value: Indoor Cam (2nd Gen) Privacy cover (attached to camera) 10W USB-A Power Adapter USB-A to Micro USB Charge Cable (6.5 ft) Install hardware Setup Guide Warranty and Safety document Security sticker

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this camera I got it for our buisness and it works great. It has a wide view so you can easily view the whole trailer and you can zoom in to see other things more closely which is nice. The audio works great on it although my employees have a hard time understanding or hearing me on it which doesn't bother me too much cuz I'd rather just watch. The play back for recordings is easy to navigate and use. Overall a very easy install and set up and easy to use app as well. I do connect this to my mobile hotspot and not a wired wifi source and it works great with my hotspot. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought ring webcam from recommendation of our home security company. I am very happy with ring. I had one nest webcam in the great room but I like Ring system better. Ring gave me clearer pictures and easy to use. Nest does not give me video record without subscription and price are more than double of ring stand up cam. Now I bought another ring to put in my great room as well. Nest system keeps ask me to sign in - may be I am not a account set up. My husband is the account set up person.Love the ring system!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera with a nice view and lots of features
reviews.reviewText: Good wide-angle view with little distortion. Not affected by the glass reflection a non-argon filled window.The only negative here, it is that you can't record anything, It doesn't have a place for an SD card. A subscription from Amazon requiredIt has many features like audio and alarm. So far, this camera performs well, and we have over 50 cameras in the house.We love the Ring Stick-up battery cameras. They are among our favorites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These replaced my Blinks
reviews.reviewText: I decided to give Ring a try, starting with just the doorbell camera. I immediately fell in love with it. I had previously used Blink cameras, but they were not satisfactory. They were slow in detecting motion and often failed to pick it up at all. Additionally, they would disconnect easily, which was frustrating. However, after replacing all of them with Ring, I have no complaints. The notifications are accurate and timely, the image quality is awesome, and the two-way speakers are very loud. Installation was also easy, and it perfectly integrates with the Ring security system. I can't wait to see what else Ring has in store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great indoor camera
reviews.reviewText: It is a great indoor camera. If you have a ring ecosystem this fits in and sets up easily. My only gripe with ring is that they are a little more on the expensive side of the cameras for monthly service but they do work well. The only other camera negative is that at night the blue status light is bright but that can be fixed with a little electrical tape, just wish it could be turned off in the settings somewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my purchase! Beautiful powerful little camera!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good! I have had it for a couple of weeks. Picture is excellent, so is motion sensing, and Wi-Fi capabilities. My favorite features are the privacy screen so it does not record a million videos of us every day! I also like that I plug it in, and don’t have to deal with batteries. The price is also very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super! Best indoor wireless camera bought ever
reviews.reviewText: This is the best camera I ever bought. I tried D-link, Reolink, Panasonic etc., But this one is easiest to setup, monitor and control through my iPhone. It has been working for couple of months but will post again after couple of years. Base is not heavy, I had to attach it to a stone coaster for stable positioning on my table, did not want to nail it. Works very well with my iPhone and records video if there is an event for later review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The dogs can't cause havoc anymore!
reviews.reviewText: We already had the Ring Spotlight Camera outside so knew this would be a solid product!It is great at capturing the smallest movements so we can check on the dogs whilst at work and make sure they aren't causing mischief!The major pros of this camera:- Great motion detection regardless of day or night and you can set the size of the motion zone- Night vision works well and everything is crisp and clear- You can set it to home or away mode so it only records/ is active when you aren't there and it can automatically switch to away mode when it senses your phone has left the premises.- incredibly affordable (we got it on prime day for $29.99)Cons:- Not very subtle so feels a little intrusive- If you aren't mounting it the stand that comes with it isn't the sturdiest
